kpi.name: M1022C72

kpi_info.title: FRAME LOSS INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO IUB DELAY
kpi_info.use: The number of "Congestion indication control frame - frame loss" sent to BTS due to Iub delay detected by Frame protocol. When the RNC Frame Protocol entity sends "Congestion Indication control frame - frame loss" indication to the base station due to Iub delay detected by Frame protocol.

kpi.kpi_alias: FRAME LOSS INDICATIONS SENT DUE TO IUB DELAY
